messages.message: Your complaint for <complaint_type> has been submitted with ID <id> on <date>. You can track your complaint status on the mSeva app or your local government web portal.
Your complaint for <complaint_type> has been re-opened on <date>.
Your complaint for <complaint_type> has been assigned to <emp_name>, <emp_designation>, <emp_department>
Your complaint for <complaint_type> has been re-assigned to <emp_name>, <emp_designation>, <emp_department>.
Your complaint for <complaint_type> has been rejected on <date>. Reason for Rejection: <reason> Additional Comments: <additional_comments>.
Your complaint for <complaint_type> has been resolved on <date>. Please give us your feedback on the mSeva app, your local government web portal or at this link <app_link>.
Your complaint has been <status>. You can track your complaint status on the mSeva app or your local government web portal
<emp_name> has commented on your complaint for <complaint_type> with complaint ID <id>. Comment - <comment>.
You have received a comment on your complaint. You can track your complaint status on the  mSeva app or your local government web portal.
